attributes.action: reaffirm the British committment to the defence of the Falkland Islands.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The people of the Falklands want to stay British. The Prime minister should tell the people of the Falklands that it is committed to the defence of the Islands, especially as the Argentinian government has restated its claims on the Islands. If the government is willing to go to War in Iraq it should be willing to protect British citizens.
